name: Ahmed Ali
bio: Computer Science student with a passion for building systems from scratch.
I enjoy exploring system design, writing clean code, and delivering well-crafted products with real-world value.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
details: Relevant Coursework: Data Structures and Algorithms, Database Management Systems, Operating Systems, Web Development.
Activities: Member of the Google Developer Student Clubs, Participant in coding competitions and hackathons.

education.title: Flutter Developer Intern
description: Developed cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter framework.
Implemented responsive UI designs and ensured seamless user experience across devices.
Collaborated with backend developers to integrate APIs and manage data flow.

volunteering.title: Flutter Co-lead

description: Leading a team of developers in creating mobile applications using Flutter.
Organizing workshops and coding sessions to enhance members' skills in mobile development.
Collaborating with other leads to plan and execute club events and projects.

volunteering.title: HR Team Member
description: Assisted in organizing and managing recruitment processes for the ICPC team.
Monitored participant feedback to enhance overall experience and maintain quality standards.

volunteering.title: BD Team Member
description: Contributed to business development strategies to expand community reach.
Assisted in organizing events and workshops to engage members and promote learning.
Collaborated with team members to identify opportunities for growth and improvement.

achievements: Architected microservices infrastructure reducing system downtime by 60%
